B

build() - Method in interface com.lexicalscope.eventcast.EventCastModuleBuilder
Provide a guice module that implements all the registered listeners

C

com.lexicalscope.eventcast - package com.lexicalscope.eventcast
 

E

EventCast - Class in com.lexicalscope.eventcast
Factory for the EventCaster Register listener interfaces with the EventCaster using the module builder The module will detect if guice creates any instance that implements one of the registered interfaces The module will provide an implementation of the registered interface for injection If you call a method on the provided implementation, the same method will be called on every other implementation of the interface
EventCast() - Constructor for class com.lexicalscope.eventcast.EventCast
 
eventCastBindingModuleBuilder() - Static method in class com.lexicalscope.eventcast.EventCast
This module will bind any listeners you bind to the builder.
EventCaster - Interface in com.lexicalscope.eventcast
The event caster is responsible for broadcasting the events
EventCastingExceptionListener - Interface in com.lexicalscope.eventcast
Implement this interface to be notified of exceptions that occur during event casting
eventCastModuleBuilder() - Static method in class com.lexicalscope.eventcast.EventCast
This module will bind the EventCaster and any listeners you bind to the builder.
EventCastModuleBuilder - Interface in com.lexicalscope.eventcast
Bind listener interfaces to the EventCaster
EventCastUnhandledListener - Interface in com.lexicalscope.eventcast
Implement this interface to be notified of events that are not handled by any listener
exceptionDuringEventCast(Throwable, Type, Object, Method, Object[]) - Method in interface com.lexicalscope.eventcast.EventCastingExceptionListener
Notified if an exception is thrown my an event listener during event casting
